name: Cozy Suites By Favstay
address: No. 19B, Ha Hoi St., Hoan Kiem Dist., Hanoi, Vietnam, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Situated in Hanoi, this air-conditioned apartment features free WiFi and a patio. The unit is 500 metres from Quan Su Temple.

A flat-screen TV is available. Other facilities at Cozy Suites By Favstay include a terrace.

Trang Tien Plaza is 600 metres from Cozy Suites By Favstay, while Ba Dinh Square is 800 metres from the property. Noi Bai International Airport is 22 km away.
